scripts.build:ui: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; cd 'C:/Users/Admin/my-react-app'; npm run build; Copy-Item -Recurse dist 'C:/Users/Admin/Documents/backend-phonebook/dist'"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
